attributes.title: Confession time: Sequential testing and why machines won't replace us any time soon, with Merritt Aho
attributes.summary: Learn how you can responsibly peek at your data mid-experiment (gasp!) and why we think machines won't be replacing CRO's any time soon.
attributes.description: Learn how you can responsibly peek at your data mid-experiment (gasp!) and why we think machines won't be replacing CRO's any time soon. Guest: Merritt Aho URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/merritt-aho
